word: The feast of tabernacles, or harvest festival, with its offerings from orchard and field, its week\92s encampment in the leafy booths, its social reunions, the sacred memorial service, and the generous hospitality to God\92s workers, the Levites of the sanctuary, and to His children, the strangers and the poor, uplifted all minds in gratitude to Him who had crowned the year with His goodness, and whose paths dropped fatness.
